title: Sketch People
subtitle: Digital Piece Based on Pencil Sketch
alt: in the top left corner there is a woman looking down with a v-neck and a curly brown hair. In the bottom right there is a woman looking up with long straight black hair and bangs.
description:
2021 

This sketch went through a lot of phases. It started as a pencil on paper sketch then into a digital sketch, through a series of simple paintings and onto this. I don't often take sketches from physical media into digital art, but I'm really happy with how this turned out.
